html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-03152023-03-31DND
ActNational Defence Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Queen's Regulations and Orders for the Canadian Forces
PrecisRegulations Amending the QUEEN'S REGULATIONS AND ORDERS FOR THE CANADIAN FORCES in order to repeal article 2.10, which deals with the authority provided to the Chief of the Defence Staff to determine and allocate military occupations of non-commissioned members to the trade groups listed in the Compensation Benefits Instructions.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Queen's Regulations and Orders for the Canadian Forces
precis: Regulations Amending the QUEEN'S REGULATIONS AND ORDERS FOR THE CANADIAN FORCES in order to repeal article 2.10, which deals with the authority provided to the Chief of the Defence Staff to determine and allocate military occupations of non-commissioned members to the trade groups listed in the Compensation Benefits Instructions.
